items.name: Cripsy Onion Rings
items.description: Deep fried vidalia onion rings served with a tangy dipping sauce

items.name: Thai spring rolls
items.description: Spring roll is a traditional Chinese savory snack where a pastry sheet is filled with vegetables, rolled & fried.

items.name: Ancho chilli cheese quesadilla
items.description: Made by filling a tortilla with cheese and other fillings, folding it in half, and toasting it until the cheese is melted and the tortilla is crispy.

items.name: Lentil soup
items.description: Made with dried lentils, fresh vegetables, flavorful spices, and hearty greens.

items.name: Vegetable soup
items.description: It's packed with veggies like carrots, sweet potatoes, tomatoes, green beans, and more.

items.name: Chicken Quinoa Salad
items.description: Grilled Gourmet chicken with coloured Quinoa, fresh vegetables, cherry tomatoes, topped with honey mustard dressing.

items.name: Greek Salad
items.description: Savor Greece with our Greek Salad filled with lettuce, cherry tomatoes, cucumbers, bell peppers, black olives, creamy feta cheese, red onions, and our delicious vinaigrette sauce.

items.name: Beans And Pasta Salad
items.description: Pasta salad with beans, corn, chickpeas and topped with vinaigrette dressing.

items.name: TURKEY & EMMENTAL
items.description: Turkey breast with emmental cheese and Dijonaise sauce on toast

items.name: TUNA BAGUETTE
items.description: Tuna with bell peppers and spring onions in brown baguette

items.name: HALLOUMI & SUN-DRIED TOMATOES
items.description: Grilled halloumi with sun-dried tomatoes, rocca, and pesto sauce in panini bread
